alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Hancock; Johnson; Madison; Marion; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 11:29PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Madison, northwestern Shelby, Hancock, northern Johnson, eastern Marion and southeastern Hamilton Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fishers to near Lawrence to 6 miles northeast of Beech Grove to near Greenwood. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fishers and Lawrence around 1135 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Greenfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 98 and 115. Interstate 69 between mile markers 200 and 203. Interstate 70 between mile markers 79 and 110. Interstate 74 between mile markers 93 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Hancock; Johnson; Madison; Marion; Shelby
